sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of the five diseases attributed to corpse evil. Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 1: 五屍者，飛屍、遁 屍、風屍、沉屍、屍疰也，其狀皆腹痛脹急，不得氣息。右搗蒺藜子， 蜜丸如胡豆，服二丸，日三 , “The five types of corpse [qi] include ‘flying corpse [qi], run-away corpse [qi], wind[-type] corpse [qi], sunken corpse [qi], and corpse [qi] attachment-illness. Their signs are abdominal pain, distension, and tightness; [patients] cannot breathe. It is best to pound ji li zi and form pills with honey the size of hu dou . [For each dosage] ingest two pills, three times a day”.
